评论详情: I love the long sleeve versions of these shirts, so I tried the tank top version and I am not disappointed at all. Perfect fit. I am 5’4”, 157lbs and the medium fit perfectly around the body and under the arms. I’m going to purchase every color of these. Extremely comfortable and looks great on - very flattering.
The material doesn’t feel as soft as it looks in the picture it is a little loss fitting but if your a bigger chested woman go with your regular size for sure.
I really love this top  I wasn't sure of the texture at first.  But works well with casual skooters or shorts
I like it but heads up the v is deep
The fabric is very soft and comfortable. The fit was exactly as shown. It washed well. I love it!
I love this top! It’s super cute with both shorts & jeans. It’s soft & comfortable, not heavy or hot at all. I love this pale pink color too.
Light weight, comfortable and nice colors. I have 4 different colors and get compliments everytime I wear one!

I was looking for a versatile white tank and this one worked out great! It's a cotton/polyester blend but feels more like cotton. It is fitted but in a loose way and does have some stretch to the fabric! The tank is not see through and is thick but not too hot to wear outside in the heat. I've washed and dried it several times without shrinking or damage. I would recommend!
Perfect fit! Love material, color and style. Super comfortable and worth the price.
Super cute shirt but everywhere it rubs...for me the seatbelt; the shirt pilled. To much hassle to cut those things off all the time.
This is very cute and comfortable. It washes and dries nicely.
This item is very nice.  It is very flattering on.

I liked the color and when I received it I noticed it was huge. Amazon recommended an XL when I normally wear a medium/large but it was more the rough cheap feeling that had me running to return. It’s too hot where I’m living to be more uncomfortable with the texture of a top.

The top is very comfortable and can be worn with a sweater or just as top and it will look nice. It washes nice and it has kept its shape its shape. And the color stays white. It's worth buying this top.
Love this tank top! 💗 Price was nice! 👍 Happy the blue was on sale!💙 Material was not thick as the picture looked😊

I think I would’ve liked this in a smaller size. It runs big, and I thought I’d like it that way. After washing and drying, it’s still on the bigger side and not my favorite. It is a flattering style!

1. The "hand/feel" of the fabric is unpleasant. Cotton is essential in waffle-weave and this blend lacks sufficient amount. 2. The size is beyond average. Based on comments, I ordered a "L" although I usually wear "XL" woven tops, and it was still very big. 3. The gray is very light with a yellow undertone, and looked very different than display photos. Overall, I don't recommend this garment based on manufacturing. Returned it same day.
Color great, comfy, great price
Most lite and comfortable
Love the look, nice material but unfortunately the small feels like a Large on me…super baggy and neck v goes below my boobs.

I really like this shirt. The green color complemented my skin tone and hair color (brown) and I got many compliments on it.  It's both dressy and casual so I thought it was a versatile purchase.  I'm 5'7", around 190lbs size 10ish 12ish and I ordered a medium because I don't love the oversized look and it fit well, form fighting but also hides all the things I didn't want everyone to see.  I also wear a hefty bra, 36DD, and it was completely covered with this, I didn't have to check my straps constantly to make sure they were hidden.  I purchased in another color previously and I like both shirts but the green is my favorite.
